info.title: Gram API Description
info.description: Gram is the tools platform for AI agents

get.description: Check the health of the service.

post.description: Upload an OpenAPI v3 document to Gram.

parameters.description: The shared token for authentication from the speakeasy system
parameters.name: shared_token

Location.description: The URL to redirect to after authentication

get.description: Provides information about the current authentication status.
Logs out the current user by clearing their session.

post.description: Switches the authentication scope to a different organization.

parameters.description: The organization slug to switch scopes
parameters.name: organization_id

parameters.description: The project id to switch scopes too
parameters.name: project_id

post.description: Create a deployment to load tool definitions.

parameters.description: A unique identifier that will mitigate against duplicate deployments.
parameters.name: Idempotency-Key

post.description: Create a deployment to load tool definitions.

get.description: List all deployments in descending order of creation.

parameters.description: The cursor to fetch results from
parameters.name: cursor

parameters.description: The slug of the environment to delete
parameters.name: slug

get.description: List all environments for an organization

parameters.description: The slug of the environment to update
parameters.name: slug

get.description: List all api keys for an organization

parameters.description: The ID of the key to revoke
parameters.name: id

get.description: List all tools for a project

parameters.description: The cursor to fetch results from
parameters.name: cursor

post.description: Create a new toolset with associated tools

delete.description: Delete a toolset by its ID

get.description: Get detailed information about a toolset including full HTTP tool definitions
List all toolsets for a project

post.description: Update a toolset's properties including name, description, and HTTP tools

parameters.description: The slug of the toolset to update
parameters.name: slug

created_at.description: The creation date of the deployment.

external_id.description: The external ID to refer to the deployment. This can be a git commit hash for example.

external_url.description: The upstream URL a deployment can refer to. This can be a github url to a commit hash or pull request.
external_url.example: Sint a atque voluptatum non velit iste.

github_pr.description: The github pull request that resulted in the deployment.

github_repo.description: The github repository in the form of "owner/repo".

github_sha.description: The commit hash that triggered the deployment.

id.description: The ID to of the deployment.

idempotency_key.description: A unique identifier that will mitigate against duplicate deployments.

openapiv3_assets.description: The IDs, as returned from the assets upload service, to uploaded OpenAPI 3.x documents whose operations will become tool definitions.
